instructions: Open Settings and select Mail from the list. Scroll down to the bottom of this page, and tap Mark addresses . You ll see a text field. Here, you can enter email address domains that you commonly contact. Add any email domains here that you like, such as @gmail.com , @mycompany.com , or @makeuseof.com . Now, when you create a new message in Mail, the app will mark all other domains in red so you know they re invalid.
